item.description:
Hi Everyone,

I just want to remind you guys that paintball is coming up this Sat. Please meet at the lobby at 1:00pm.
Bring more friends and please update your RSVPs by this Friday so I can call in to let them know how many people will show up. The more people, the more fun it's going to be.

There will be dinner plan after paintball if anyone is up for it.

If it snows 2' then we'll cancel the event, otherwise, the game is still on!

Price: $35/Person, this includes everything & 200 paint balls. There is an option for you to buy more paint balls.
Meetup fee: $1

REQUIREMENTs: Please read the rules, sign the waiver & bring it w/ you on that day. See the link below.
http://www.randolphpa...

Where: Randolph Paintball Indoor Field (at the corner of South & Center Streets)
410 South Street
Randolph MA 02368

When: Meet in the front lobby at 1:00pm to get ready for the 1:30pm game. The game will end around 4pm. Most people play between 2-3 hours.



tran
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the front lobby at 1:00pm

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Paintball Time!!!!!!
